department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Temporary help services for federal government departments and agencies on an as and when requested basis.
description: Temporary help services to federal government departments and agencies in one or more of the geographical Areas listed in Annex "A" Statement of Work, on an as and when requested basis.
full_summary:
===========================================

**Tender Title**
---------------

E6TOR-20RM13-F: Request for Standing Offer (RSO) for Temporary Personnel Services

**Tender ID**
-------------

WS3987012668-Doc4275525154

**Tender Status**
-----------------

Expired

**Contract Duration**
---------------------

12 months, commencing on December 1, 2023, with an optional 1-year extension

**Procurement Method**
----------------------

Competitive - Open bidding, with the lowest price as the selection criterion

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

Subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Service Requirement**
---------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) seeks to establish a standing offer with a qualified contractor for the provision of temporary help services to federal government departments and agencies in one or more of the geographical areas listed in Annex "A" Statement of Work. The services will be provided on an as-and-when-requested basis.

**Key Details**
-------------

* Start date: December 1, 2023
* End date: May 31, 2024, with the option to extend by 1 year
* Geographical areas: Annexe "A" Statement of Work
* Services: Temporary help services
* Procurement method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contracting Entity**
-----------------------

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* Robert Berends (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [robert.berends@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:robert.berends@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL**
--------------

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17823810?extsite=MTc4MjM4MTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
